Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: A bit expensive, but you get what you pay for. It‚Äôs a nice restaurant to go for a fancy lunch/dinner

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great drinks and super nice back garden. Food was not that special - I was a bit disappointed to be honest.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
Great upmarket dining in a very beautiful, relaxing atmosphere with excellent, friendly service. Every dish was a great combination of flavours.
We went two days in a row for a three and four course dinner respectively, ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Loved it, nicely decorated restaurant, menu and food selection were  nice as well friendly team members

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: I will say, the food is good. I had the fish. With couscous, and it was nice. The couscous done well. My date had the steak, with risotto and it was very tender. The white wine was really good. I was a little disappointed about the oysters. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Lovely restaurant with great location in the city centre, interior is nice, wonderful and friendly service, you don't need to wait long and waitresses help you with menu, they can cook bigger portion for you if you like the dish that goes ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: i wish it's as tasty as it looks(( nice place but not for good food

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
Fantastic! Cocktails, food, atmosphere.....

Read numerous recommendations about Lion Noir before going there and the ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Lion Noir has very good steaks, perfectly cooked, nice service, not the most clean bathrooms. Also, I was disappointed by the desert. But in rest is a good place to go out in the city center.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: When I was looking for the restaurant, I passed by it first since there is no clear sign/restaurant name, so had to walk back. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Delicious food at a reasonable price.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Gorgeous food - really can‚Äôt fault it and the cocktails were great too. The service was disappointing thought - staff were very slow did not seem to have a system of which zone they were serving.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Luxurious dining with luxurious service and tableware. Food was good but not that special for the price. Same goes for the decoration on the top floor.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Love that place. One of most splendid ambiences in Amsterdam I think, with super cute staff, very nice manager and great music. Awesome bites and coctails. Bloody mexican is a killer, alice delicious as well. Try blines with kaviar and tempura shrimps - Ill run back for them anytime! Next month we are throwing my bf bday there!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great tasty steak. Weak flavored salmon. Nice ambience. BUT super small dishes. Eat at least 3 courses. In my opinion far too expensive for what u get. Won‚Äôt visit again.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Pleasant lunch spot with a beautiful open air table section that cannot be seen from the street. Good selection of bottled wine. Not many by the glass wine options. Intetesting eclectic selection of sandwiches and salads. Excellent service.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
4 courses diner menu is great, super tasty food. The Bloody Mary twist with Tequila is amazing!
Very nice courtyard, attentive and kind staff

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Food is pricey and service was a bit clumsy (spilling wine for example, yes red wine üôà) for cocktails this is a great place with a nice ambiance right in the city center. For food you might want to check out the Tibetan food across the ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: The dinner was absolutely delicious and special! The service as well the food were outstanding to the last detail. The staff was personal and managed the service perfectly. We really had a romantic evening together, definitely a place to go back to!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Best meal in Amsterdam. The 5 course meal is worth every penny. Its delicious and service is perfect

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: We had a fixed group menu with 2 wine pairings.It was lovely with inspiring food combinations, just the exact quantity of food. They made me a lactose free desert which was amazing because otherwise they would have served panacota . Usually ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Beautiful surroundings - a hidden garden in the center of Amsterdam. Probably the best service I‚Äôve ever had in the Netherlands - waiters who are genuinely happy to converse with you and take pride in their service. I just got home from ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great food and beautiful wines! But most importantly super nice atmoshere and staff.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Very cute and vibey restaurant. The decoration is beautiful and the service is nice and friendly. I didn't dine there but the snacks were good. Nice place to chill outside or dine inside.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Really slow and bit of rude service. Portions were small and did not arrive at same time. Some persons really had to wait a while. Taste was ok but not special. Won‚Äôt come here again for lunch

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Excellent 3-5 courses set menu and nice atmosphere of place.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Very cozy and extra friendly staff. Everything we ordered (oysters, yellowfin appetizer, langoustine vichyssoise , monkfish, veal, and angus beef) was delicious and all of our plates were wiped clean. Highly recommend for dinner with family, dates or group of friends! Cocktails are yum too.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great looking place although it looks like nothing from the street... My oysters with soya sauce and ginger were wonderfully fresh and super tasty...

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Really nice cozy restaurant and bar with great food and a warm atmosphere. The staff was very friendly, even though I arrived very late in the evening. I can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Fantastic food and great cocktails. We were sitting downstairs because the restaurant upstairs was packed, which means the service was a bit slow, but the atmosphere and friendliness definitely made up for it.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, tends to get full easily so make a booking if you really wanna try this place out. Foods good (around 25 euros) and staffs alright, best thing about this place is the atmosphere.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Expensive look and interior. Quality food for a decent price eg lunch salad ~‚Ç¨9. Not 5 stars rated due to some of the staffs attitude.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: We orderd steaktartar with ducklever. At the end the lever was served with the main course.  We had coquilles and they were over cooked en way too salty. The sauce and asperges were good. Next we had the duck which was also way too salty ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: A really nice restaurant with good food and drink. Special design

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: The inner patio is a peaceful gem hidden in one of the most convulsed Amsterdam streets. Food is as tasty as it seems and the overall experience was great too.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Wonderful dining experience! We‚Äôve ordered the three-course ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù chef‚Äôs menu and were absolutely delighted with the taste, awesome from start to finish. Highly recommended, but you never know what you gonna get. Wine pairings were ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Awesome place. I love everything about it. The interior is beautiful, very stylish and not too many tables for lunch. The waiter was super friendly and gave us a lot of personal attention. The food was fresh, very good quality, especially ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Food and atmosphere was great. Service attentive and swift. Well worth going for the Chef's Menu, where you select either 3, 4 or 5 courses and are given whatever the chef selects. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Probably one of the best restaurants in Amsterdam. This restaurant features a beautiful garden and interior. Food was delicious and price a bit above the market but with a good reason. It was high quality. I find portioning a little bit too ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Poor quality food. Lack of flavour although you can see they made effort on the presentation. Both steak and pork are dry without any sauce.  Prawn starter is small and very average taste. Really love the interior design of the restaurant but will not come back again.  Waiters were also a bit grumpy. Will not recommend.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: A great place in the heart of Amsterdam. Get a place outside and finish your dinner with the best shot: French kiss

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
Delicious and good quality food, nice atmosphere and good service. The chef's menu is the best option, every time I order it, it's always a good surprise!
The dessert could be served in a bigger portion.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: From the moment i walk in it was off. I had read other reviews about the service and although each server was perfectly friendly they are disorganised and just a little uninterested. The drinks were good although we received them at ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Came in to have a nice meal together and were quite disappointed. Bad service and had to send place settings back because it was dirty (old lipstick on the glasses). Didn't stay for the full meal.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Nice tapas restaurant with good food. The service is excellent and the food is tasteful. The atmosphere is Cody and somehow authentic with good space and ability to talk without to much noise. The food is good and is served relative fast and taste as it should. I recommend this place for a good tapas

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great spot for a drink before or after dinner. Awesome courtyard at the back if it's a nice night. Cocktail menu looks awesome but unfortunately they didn't taste as awesome.  My whiskey and ginger beer cocktail was way too sweet and my ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: The interior is nice, the atmosphere is good but the portions of food we got for lunch were so small they could be called snacks. And the taste was just average, thus I found it overpriced. If your lunch/dinner is about the decoration, go there, but if it's about eating well try to avoid this place.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Gorgeous back garden space, and just really really good food. The service is also significantly better than what you usually get in Amsterdam, with friendly waiters and hosts who try to make sure you're enjoying your time. The portions are ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: This was an excellent dining experience. The staff were very friendly and inviting, the restaurant was very well located, and the food was excellent. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Kitchen had jusssst closed and despite our instance they not, the staff seated us and stayed open to serve us! They were friendly, helpful, and warm. We hung out by the fire after we ate and enjoyed the wacky decor. Great food, good prices, and what a great staff. Say hi to the peacock for me!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: I've been here only twice. First time was for cocktails where the bartender was really gracious and made me a brandy Alexander although it wasn't on the menu and he had never heard of it. (It was created perfectly!) I recently had a ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Lion Noir offers a French-inspired menu, which looks good on the pictures but unfortunately doesn't taste as great as it looks. They do put a lot of effort in the presentation, yet it doesn't make up for the poor quality. Furthermore, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Had a lovely evening with some friends at Lion Noir last summer We wanted to eat in the late afternoon when they were just about to close and then decided to make a reservation for dinner later that day. Staff was extremely friendly and we ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: I only had some of the bar bites and drinks here.  The cheese platter and the charcuterie platter were nice and filled me up. They unfortunately had their kitchen closed at 4 PM do couldn't try their regular menu.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
The beer was rather warm. I wish her it came in colder glasses at least.
The food came in small portions but it was very delicious! It was great!
I recommend this place for the nice atmosphere and central location.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: For the price the experience is sub par. Sitting in the garden at a table without a table cloth (other tables were made) on uncomfortable hipster chairs. Staff has an attitude and doesn't appear to have proper training. Prices are ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Gorgeous place. Comfortable atmosphere and good food. The slurpers (especially French kiss) are really good. Super staff too. Love it!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
Looks great, but for some reason, didn't want to host us, twice.
I guess you need to wear a tux at least to get in, and look like a white 50ish guy who succeeded in corporate life. ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Good atmosphere. But extremely expensive compared to the quality of the dishes that were less than average: the fish and meat were highly overcooked whereas the vegetables were undercooked.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Very cosy inside with a fire place. Great place to go for a bottle of wine and some snacks - try the popcorn chicken. In summer the beautiful garden at the back is lovely. For dinner upstairs they are almost always full, so best to book.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: I had an awesome lunch. They had oysters and caviar on the menu. I'm not that posh so i had a great egg with ham and cheese. This is a place where i will have lunch again. The service was superb.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: A decent restaurant with a great little outdoor garden in the back where you may also choose to eat your meal. I think the interior thrives at night when it is more of a bar scene than a dining experience.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Really amazing salads at lunchtime, gorgeous outdoor tables in hidden-away garden, varied cocktail menu (though didn't try them), good service. Reasonable prices. Very keen to go back.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Very very slow service, we needed to remind the waitress after 50min ordering. Nice decoration and terrace, food is good with rather small portions.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: We had dinner at lion noir at it was an amazing experience. The place is cosy but elegant, upscale but not formal. The food was nothing less than wonder: beef tartare soft, delicate but with its own personality, the duck liver p√¢t√© was an ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Good food and reasonable service in a very nicely decorated place. The portions are small and the prices high so go when someone else is paying for you. In summer you can sit in the garden out back.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: We decided to go straight to main to save room for dessert. My husband and I are not into huge portions but these main courses were so minuscule that we were still hungry. My husband had duck breast which was small, with some blobs of ‚Ä¶

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: The terrace is really nice, cozy and full of hydrangeas. It is not a cheap place, but the staff is nice, the food is quite good, and the cocktails are sooo good.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere and a live fireplace. Went in for lunch, extremely satisfied with Ceasar's salade. Music is also a good mix between oldies and new songs. Pricing is on point.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Unfortunatly the service was not good. They even told us that they might forget about us as we sat inside and they ran around like chickens putting all focus on the outdoor seating. No organisation among the staff at all. A real shame as the place is really nice and the drinks we had did so they didnt get a 2 star rating.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great atmosphere, amazing food and drinks

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Good atmosphere but food was a miss and definitely not worth the price (16‚Ç¨ starter, 26‚Ç¨ main). The monkfish was overcooked.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text:
Lion Noir offers an French-inspired menu in a quirky decor.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great service from Bobby and an excellent show of him sliding down the spiral staircase.  Worth every penny - I had the duck and cleaned my plate... And took a piece from my friend's plate too!!

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Awesome. Had the Xmas Dinner and it was delicious.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Great food, especially the duck. Great wines. We had the pleasure to have warm weather and enjoy sitting out back on the beautiful terrace.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Nice atmosphere, staff is friendly. Food is overall good despite small portions and funky food combination choices, e.g. serving popcorn with meat (what? why?).

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: The food was amazing and the space was warm and inviting.

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Good food, one blond girl during lunch was very rude and unprofessional. That made the experience much less good. Because the rest was great.

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Incredible, little spendy, lunch in one of the best kept secret back gardens of Amsterdam. In the middle of the city, you have no clue if sitting in the back garden. So peaceful and calm.

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir

Name: Lion Noir
Review Text: Amazing food and atmosphere. I ate a superb veal, and as a start a tastful caviar, they have very good prices  for the quality and level of the rest.

Name: Lion Noir
